json: {"filters":[],"fields":[["name","Pouring"],["docstatus","Pouring"],["discription","Additional Cost Details"],["expense_head_account","Additional Cost Details"],["amount","Additional Cost Details"],["is_electricity_expense","Additional Cost Details"]],"order_by":"`tabPouring`.`modified` desc","add_totals_row":0,"page_length":20,"column_widths":{"name":120,"docstatus":120,"Additional Cost Details:discription":120,"Additional Cost Details:expense_head_account":120,"Additional Cost Details:amount":120,"Additional Cost Details:is_electricity_expense":120},"group_by":null,"chart_args":{"chart_type":"bar","x_axis":"heat_date","y_axes":["Casting Details:total_quantity"]}}
name: Electricity Consumption  and Cost Report
query:
select parent 'Pouring Id',discription 'Discription',expense_head_account 'Expense Head Account',amount 'Amount',is_electricity_expense 'Is Electricity Expense' from `tabAdditional Cost Details`
where is_electricity_expense = 1
